Package Intranet

Class DataBase

java.lang.Object
Intranet.DataBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DataBase extends Object implements Serializable
The DataBase class used as a storage for the application. This class supports CRUD operations for the stored data.
See Also:
Serialized Form
